title: Gemma Collins insists she has 'supernatural abilities' which rival Stranger Things' Eleven
text:
She is a great believer in the supernatural, spending thousands on psychic readings over the years.

And Gemma Collins is convinced she has superhuman abilities as she compared herself to Stranger Things character Eleven in this week's episode of her BBC podcast.

In Wednesday's upcoming show, The Diva Forever star said when she was younger she could 'see and feel things that others didn't', and now at the age of 38, her 'breasts get heavy on the full moon'.

Supernatural: Gemma Collins is convinced she has superhuman abilities as she compared herself to Stranger Things' Eleven in this week's episode of her BBC podcast.

Saying how she is like the character Eleven, who inherited psychokinetic abilities, Gemma said: 'When I was younger like I didn’t really understand that I could feel things that maybe other people didn’t or see things that other people didn’t.

'It’s only when I watched Stranger Things… now I feel like Millie Bobby Brown and I get it.'

And the former TOWIE star is a firm believer in how astrology can impact changes in her physical body.

Superhuman: Saying how she is like the character Eleven, who inherited psychokinetic abilities, Gemma said: 'When I was younger I could feel things that maybe other people didn’t'

She continued: 'I don’t know about you but my breasts get so heavy on a full moon. Literally I can barely move.

'They fill with water. When I looked into this, the moon’s made up of water and that can affect water within.'

Gemma also talked about how she was a firm believer in aliens. She said: 'Aliens if you can hear me please, I’ve got lots of land here where we live.

'There’s lots of green fields. Land your UFOs where I live, I wanna talk to you, I wanna hug you, I wanna meet you. I’m not scared of aliens.'

'My breasts get heavy at the full moon': The former TOWIE star is a firm believer in how astrology can impact changes in her physical body (pictured last month near the full moon)

The GC is a firm believer in other-worldly presences and has often spoken about how she has relied on psychics in her life.

Back in February, Gemma brought in a shaman to cleanse the rink of negative energy after her horrible fall on Dancing on Ice.

Prior to that the reality star said she spent over a £1,000 pounds when she was younger seeing a psychic after she broke up with a boyfriend in the hope they would get back together.

Gemma's episode drops on BBC Sounds at 10am on Wednesday.
description: Gemma Collins is convinced she has superhuman abilities as she compared herself to Stranger Things' Eleven in this week's episode of her BBC podcast.
